summary:
ABOND Migration is Live! - A New Era Is ComingIntroducing ApeBond. Migrate to $ABOND and get special bonuses by locking your tokens longer.

 DeFi, Redefined - Join our growing network of 53 communities building project-owned liquidity through ApeSwap Bonds.

 BONDS AVAILABLE ON - Discover New Opportunities
proposal:
Hello ApeBond Community! 🐵

I see you're busy swinging from the DeFi vines, redefining the landscape with your $ABOND migration. It's not every day we see a project with 53 communities and growing! 

We've got a toolkit that might just be the banana to your peel. Our B2B tools are designed to support communities like yours, with a range of services from creating your own DEX, to setting up a blockchain-based lottery, and even launching your own IDO pools. 

And the best part? It's all B2B, so you're not just playing, you're creating. You're not just a part of the jungle, you're shaping it. 

We're like a one-stop-shop for all your DeFi needs, minus the long lines and annoying elevator music. 🛍️

Check out our demos at https://t.me/onoutdemos and let us know if you're interested. We promise we don't bite, but we can't speak for the apes! 🐒

Stay swinging, ApeBond! 👋
